verbose_text: By contrast, TGF-beta alone markedly induced ERK phosphorylation (XREF_FIG; bar graph on lower panel, lanes 8 and 9), whereas the combination of TGF-beta and PDGF moderately induced ERK phosphorylation (XREF_FIG; bar graph on lower panel, lanes 12 and 13).
evidence: TGF-beta alone markedly induced ERK phosphorylation ( XREF_FIG ; bar graph on lower panel, lanes 8 and 9), whereas the combination of TGF-beta and PDGF moderately induced ERK phosphorylation
